attributes.action: Drop price of vet bills and make  insurance companies pay out
attributes.additional_details: I had a dog and I had to have her put to sleep because I could not afford the vets prices for one night stay after a mager op was £1000 on top of the end bill
attributes.background: Pet insurance company's to pay up instead of you paying pet bill and then they pay you

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear that you had to put your dog to sleep, but the Government is not responsible for vet fees or insurance for pets. This is a matter for individual veterinary practices and insurers.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a “PHS (Pet Health Service)” Scheme paid for by pet owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564754

Create a free Animal Health Service for pets please: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142
